content.html: Hi @BBCNews - how about a different headline? “JK Rowling attacks Nicola Sturgeon’s support for trans rights”. Funny you framed it differently. Almost as if the BBC News team is institutionally transphobic. Oh, and by the way, #TransRightsAreHumanRights
content.value: Hi @BBCNews - how about a different headline? “JK Rowling attacks Nicola Sturgeon’s support for trans rights”.  Funny you framed it differently. Almost as if the BBC News team is institutionally transphobic. Oh, and by the way, #TransRightsAreHumanRights
